mapper.select: SELECT iata_a FROM IATA_CODE_AIRPORT WHERE ANAME_E LIKE '%'||'International'||'%' and acity_k like '%'||#{acountry_k}||'%'

select SCHEDULE_ID , DEPARTURE_ACODE , DESTINATION_ACODE , DEPART_DATE , ARRIVE_DATE , AIRLINE_NAME , AIRCRAFT_NAME , PRICE, to_char(ROUND((arrive_date-depart_date)*24*60)) DURATION_OF_TIME from schedule where departure_acode = '${DEPARTURE_ACODE}' and destination_acode = '${DESTINATION_ACODE}' and depart_date between to_date('${DEPART_DATE} 00:00:00', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${DEPART_DATE} 23:59:59', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')

select SCHEDULE_ID , DEPARTURE_ACODE , DESTINATION_ACODE , DEPART_DATE , ARRIVE_DATE , AIRLINE_NAME , AIRCRAFT_NAME , PRICE, to_char(ROUND((arrive_date-depart_date)*24*60)) DURATION_OF_TIME from schedule where departure_acode = '${DESTINATION_ACODE}' and destination_acode = '${DEPARTURE_ACODE}' and depart_date between to_date('${ARRIVE_DATE} 00:00:00', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${ARRIVE_DATE} 23:59:59', 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')
select ANAME_K from ANAME_KR where IATA_A = #{aCode}
